overview:
Steffen Hellmold is the Vice President of Marketing of Everspin Technologies Inc, leading the MRAM market evolution and developing new market opportunities for Toggle and Spin-Torque MRAM. He is driving product market leadership for Spin-Torque MRAM and is establishing strategic relationships with eco system stakeholders.

Before joining Everspin, Steffen was Vice President of Business Development at SandForce, and prior to that he served in executive management positions at Seagate Technology, Lexar Media (a subsidiary of Micron), Samsung Semiconductor and SMART Modular Technologies.
